gov.usgs.traveltime.tables

Class TauInt

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.traveltime.tables.TauInt

  • public class TauInt
extends java.lang.Object
    Integrate tau and distance, x, along a ray path through the normalized, flattened Earth model. Note that this extends and replaces the FORTRAN routine of the same name.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TauInt(EarthModel tabModel, ModConvert convert)
      The constructor remembers the model data input to the table generation.
      TauInt(ModDataVol tauModel)
      The constructor remembers the model data output from the table generation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getRbottom()
      Get the bottoming radius, R, for a range of layers.
      double getXLayer()
      Get the integrated distance, X, for one layer.
      double getXSum()
      Get the integrated distance, X, for a range of layers.
      double intLayer(double p, double pTop, double pBot, double zTop, double zBot)
      Integrate tau and distance over one layer.
      double intRange(double p, int start, int end)
      Integrate tau and distance over a range of model layers from the output of the model generation.
      double intRange(double p, int start, int end, double pLast, double zLast)
      Integrate tau and distance over a range of model layers plus an additional increment at the end from the output of the model generation.
      double intRange(double p, int start, int end, double pFirst, double zFirst, double pLast, double zLast)
      Integrate tau and distance over a range of model layers plus an additional increment at the beginning and the end from the output of the model generation.
      double intX(char type, double p)
      Integrate tau and distance over a range of model layers plus an additional increment at the end from the input to the model generation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TauInt

        public TauInt(ModDataVol tauModel)
        The constructor remembers the model data output from the table generation. Note that this implies a separate tauInt for each model wave type.
        Parameters:
        tauModel - Model data ('P' or 'S')

      • TauInt

        public TauInt(EarthModel tabModel,
              ModConvert convert)
        The constructor remembers the model data input to the table generation. Note that this implies a separate tauInt for each model wave type.
        Parameters:
        tabModel - Model data
        convert - Model dependent constants

    • Method Detail

      • intRange

        public double intRange(double p,
                       int start,
                       int end)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Integrate tau and distance over a range of model layers from the output of the model generation.
        Parameters:
        p - Normalized ray parameter
        start - Starting model layer index
        end - Ending model layer index
        Returns:
        Normalized integrated tau
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If tau or x is negative in any layer

      • intRange

        public double intRange(double p,
                       int start,
                       int end,
                       double pLast,
                       double zLast)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Integrate tau and distance over a range of model layers plus an additional increment at the end from the output of the model generation.
        Parameters:
        p - Normalized ray parameter
        start - Starting model layer index
        end - Ending model layer index
        pLast - Last normalized slowness
        zLast - Last normalized depth
        Returns:
        Normalized integrated tau
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If tau or x is negative in any layer

      • intRange

        public double intRange(double p,
                       int start,
                       int end,
                       double pFirst,
                       double zFirst,
                       double pLast,
                       double zLast)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Integrate tau and distance over a range of model layers plus an additional increment at the beginning and the end from the output of the model generation.
        Parameters:
        p - Normalized ray parameter
        start - Starting model layer index
        end - Ending model layer index
        pFirst - First normalized slowness
        zFirst - First normalized depth
        pLast - Last normalized slowness
        zLast - Last normalized depth
        Returns:
        Normalized integrated tau
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If tau or x is negative in any layer

      • intX

        public double intX(char type,
                   double p)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Integrate tau and distance over a range of model layers plus an additional increment at the end from the input to the model generation.
        Parameters:
        type - Slowness type (P = P slowness, S = S slowness)
        p - Normalized ray parameter
        Returns:
        Normalized integrated tau
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If tau or x is negative in any layer

      • intLayer

        public double intLayer(double p,
                       double pTop,
                       double pBot,
                       double zTop,
                       double zBot)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Integrate tau and distance over one layer. Note that the plethora of special cases arose from years of bitter experience.
        Parameters:
        p - Normalized ray parameter
        pTop - Normalized slowness at the top of the layer
        pBot - Normalized slowness at the bottom of the layer
        zTop - Normalized depth at the top of the layer
        zBot - Normalized depth at the bottom of the layer
        Returns:
        Normalized tau
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If tau or x is negative

      • getXLayer

        public double getXLayer()
        Get the integrated distance, X, for one layer.
        Returns:
        The normalized distance for one layer

      • getXSum

        public double getXSum()
        Get the integrated distance, X, for a range of layers.
        Returns:
        The normalized distance for a range of layers

      • getRbottom

        public double getRbottom()
        Get the bottoming radius, R, for a range of layers.
        Returns:
        The dimensional bottoming Earth radius in kilometers
